10.title: Lovery Ka Darr and Duplicate Lovely
10.plot: Lovely is relaxing in the police station on his chair while Pandu is cleaning up his desk. Pandu is cleaning the shelf when he sees the bravery awards won by Lovely. He asks Lovely that he is so fearless but there must be something he is afraid of.

12.title: The U Turn and Home Sweet Home
12.plot: Anthony steps inside his house and with his first step he topples over a glass and falls down and his head gets stuck inside a metal pot. He gets up and before he could try to pull it out he bangs his head into a low hanging bulb and gets a shock.

1.title: Street Light and the Gangsters
1.plot: Anthony innocently steals a cell phone, only to realize it is filled with diamonds and was in the process of delivery from one gangster to another when he managed to pinch it.

3.title: Happy Holiday and Traffic Rules
3.plot: Anthony is stealing suitcases at the railway station. He takes one, opens it but it has nothing worthwhile. He is disappointed but just then sees another man with a similar suitcase. He goes and bumps into him, exchanges suitcases and finds free holiday coupons and tickets inside.

4.title: Shop Lifting and by the Sea
4.plot: On the sea face promenade, a lot of couples sit together looking out at the sea. Anthony makes use of this opportunity to pick out the wallets from the back pockets. Once, he unknowingly picks the Inspector's wallet who has come there with Titli.

12.title: Joyride and Slippery as Ice
12.plot: The country's biggest indoor ice skating rink. People are enjoying themselves. Anthony finds it a perfect opportunity to pick pockets. Someone notices a missing wallet and informs the police and Lovely arrives.

2.title: Christmas Eve and Independence Day
2.plot: Lovely is chasing Anthony. Anthony runs out of a lane and Lovely comes after him. Anthony is running on the walk way and suddenly his attention is diverted to the announcement on the loudspeaker.

3.title: Chalo Amirtsar and Artist Anthony
3.plot: It is a scary night with dark clouds, rain, thunder and lightning. Lovely is having a restless sleep and is rolling over in his bed. A lightning bolt strikes a Haunted house nearby and Lovely wakes up.

4.title: The Great Escape and Without Water
4.plot: Anthony is sitting in a tea shop and orders a Tea. Anthony while eating the Namkeen, he suddenly sees an artist standing with his abstract painting.

6.title: Birthday Trouble and RV Most Wanted
6.plot: Anthony is walking down the street when he sees a man standing on the walkway reading the newspaper. Anthony walks up to the man and steals the purse but he comes back as his eyes stick to a photograph in the newspaper of world's most expensive RV that is purchased by the biggest industrialist of India.

imdb.plot outline: Anthony is a thief who lives in the slums of Mumbai. He usually steals not for himself, but for other people. Because of which, he is known as the Robinhood Slumdog of Mumbai. Not that it matters who he steals for, since the police will try to catch him anyway. His constant battle to outwit Lovely Singh, and they both find themselves in adventures one after the other.
imdb.title: Chorr Police
plot: Anthony is a thief who lives in the slums of Mumbai. He usually steals not for himself, but for other people. Because of which, he is known as the Robinhood Slumdog of Mumbai. Not that it matters who he steals for, since the police will try to catch him anyway. His constant battle to outwit Lovely Singh, and they both find themselves in adventures one after the other.
